resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81376</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81376</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4413</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Games Across The Generations</string>
            <string language="es">Los juegos a través de las generaciones</string>
            <string language="ga">Cluichí Thar na nGlúine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiele Über Den Erzeugungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jeux À travers Les Générations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Jogos Através Das Gerações</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Giochi Attraverso Le Generazioni</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παιχνίδια στις γενεές</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Lesson idea where children can compare the street games they play with those played by their parents or teacher when they were young.</string>
            <string language="es">Tema de lección donde los niños pueden comparar los juegos de la calle que juegan con los que jugaban sus padres o el profesor cuando eran jóvenes.</string>
            <string language="ga">Smaoineamh ceachta inar féidir le leanaí comparáid a dhéanamh idir cluichí sráide a imríonn siad agus na cluichí a d’imir a dtuismitheoirí nó an múinteoir nuair a bhí siadsan óg.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">SESE History</string>
            <string language="es">Historia SESE. Plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">OSIE Stair</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektionidee, in der Kinder die Straße Spiele 
vergleichen können, spielen sie mit denen, die von ihren Eltern oder 
von Lehrer, als sie, gespielt werden jung waren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Idée de leçon où les enfants peuvent comparer 
les jeux de rue ils jouent avec ceux joués par leurs parents ou 
professeur quand ils étaient jeunes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A idéia da lição onde as crianças podem 
comparar os jogos da rua jogam com as aquelas jogadas por seu pais ou 
professor quando eram novas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Idea di lezione dove i bambini possono 
confrontare i giochi della via giocano con quelli giocati dai loro 
genitori o insegnante quando erano giovani.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιδέα μαθήματος όπου τα παιδιά μπορούν να συγκρίνουν 
τα παιχνίδια οδών παίζουν με εκείνους που παίζονται από τους 
γονείς ή το δάσκαλό τους όταν ήταν νέοι.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">SESE Geschichte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Histoire de SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">History de SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Storia di SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma Di Lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιστορία SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
